flavorText: As you hear it baying in the distance, you'll feel its breath on your neck.

foreignData.flavorText: Sowie du sein Bellen in der Ferne vernimmst, wirst du seinen Atem im Nacken spüren.
foreignData.name: Hund der Weitmoore
foreignData.text: Delirium — Der Hund der Weitmoore hat Bedrohlichkeit, solange dein Friedhof vier oder mehr unterschiedlichen Kartentypen enthält. (Eine Kreatur mit Bedrohlichkeit kann nicht geblockt werden, außer von zwei oder mehr Kreaturen.)

foreignData.flavorText: Mientras lo escuchas aullar en la distancia, sientes su aliento en la nuca.
foreignData.name: Sabueso de Ciénaga Lejana
foreignData.text: Delirio — El Sabueso de Ciénaga Lejana tiene la habilidad de amenaza mientras entre las cartas de tu cementerio haya cuatro o más tipos de cartas. (Una criatura con la habilidad de amenaza no puede ser bloqueada excepto por dos o más criaturas.)

foreignData.flavorText: Quand son aboiement résonne dans le lointain, vous sentez déjà son souffle sur votre nuque.
foreignData.name: Chien des Farbogs
foreignData.text: Délire — Le Chien des Farbogs a la menace tant qu'il y a au moins quatre types de carte parmi les cartes de votre cimetière. (Une créature avec la menace ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par deux créatures ou plus.)
foreignData.type: Créature : zombie et chien de chasse

foreignData.flavorText: Non appena ne avvertirai il latrato in lontananza, sentirai il suo fiato sul collo.
foreignData.name: Segugio delle Paludi Lontane
foreignData.text: Delirio — Il Segugio delle Paludi Lontane ha minacciare fintanto che ci sono quattro o più tipi di carta tra le carte nel tuo cimitero. (Una creatura con minacciare non può essere bloccata tranne che da due o più creature.)

foreignData.flavorText: 遠くで吠える声が聞こえたと思った途端、首にかかる息を感じるだろう。
foreignData.name: 遠沼の猟犬
foreignData.text: 昂揚 ― あなたの墓地にあるカードにカード・タイプが合計４種類以上含まれるかぎり、遠沼の猟犬は威迫を持つ。（威迫を持つクリーチャーは、２体以上のクリーチャーによってしかブロックされない。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ・猟犬

foreignData.flavorText: 멀리서 으르렁거리는 소리를 듣는 순간, 목에서 그 놈의 숨결을 느낄 수 있다.
foreignData.name: 먼늪지 사냥개
foreignData.text: 섬망 — 당신의 무덤에 네 개 이상의 카드 유형이 있는 한, 먼늪지 사냥개는 호전적을 가진다. (호전적이 있는 생물은 두 개 이상의 생물로만 방어할 수 있다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Quando você o ouvir latindo ao longe, sentirá seu hálito em seu pescoço.
foreignData.name: Sabujo de Brejolonge
foreignData.text: Delírio — Sabujo de Brejolonge terá ameaçar enquanto houver quatro ou mais tipos de card entre os cards de seu cemitério. (Uma criatura com ameaçar só pode ser bloqueada por duas ou mais criaturas.)

foreignData.flavorText: Ты слышишь вдали его лай, а через мгновение его зубы уже впиваются тебе в горло.
foreignData.name: Фарбогский Пес
foreignData.text: Буйство — Фарбогский Пес имеет Угрозу, пока среди карт на вашем кладбище есть не менее четырех типов карт. (Существо с Угрозой не может быть заблокировано менее чем двумя существами.)

foreignData.flavorText: 耳边刚刚听到远处吠叫，脖间就已传来低沈鼻息。
foreignData.name: 远沼猎犬
foreignData.text: 躁狂～只要你坟墓场中牌的类别有四种或更多，远沼猎犬便具有威慑异能。（具威慑异能的生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）

foreignData.flavorText: 耳邊剛剛聽到遠處吠叫，脖間就已傳來低沈鼻息。
foreignData.name: 遠沼獵犬
foreignData.text: 躁狂～只要你墳墓場中牌的類別有四種或更多，遠沼獵犬便具有威懾異能。（具威懾異能的生物只能被兩個或更多生物阻擋。）

name: Hound of the Farbogs
originalText: Delirium — Hound of the Farbogs has menace as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

rulings.text: Menace only matters as blockers are chosen. Causing Hound of the Farbogs to gain menace after blockers are chosen won’t cause it to become unblocked.

The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

text: Delirium — Hound of the Farbogs has menace as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
